      • IsDevicePaired

        public boolean IsDevicePaired(java.lang.String address)
        Checks whether the Bluetooth device with the given address is paired.
        Parameters:
        address - the MAC address of the Bluetooth device
        Returns:
        true if the device is paired, false otherwise

      • AddressesAndNames

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> AddressesAndNames()
        Returns the list of paired Bluetooth devices. Each element of the returned list is a String consisting of the device's address, a space, and the device's name. This method calls isDeviceClassAcceptable to determine whether to include a particular device in the returned list.
        Returns:
        a List representing the addresses and names of paired Bluetooth devices

      • isDeviceClassAcceptable

        private boolean isDeviceClassAcceptable(java.lang.Object bluetoothDevice)
        Returns true if the class of the given device is acceptable.
        Parameters:
        bluetoothDevice - the Bluetooth device

      • Connect

        public boolean Connect(java.lang.String address)
        Connect to a Bluetooth device with the given address.
        Parameters:
        address - the MAC address of the Bluetooth device
        Returns:
        true if the connection was successful, false otherwise

      • ConnectWithUUID

        public boolean ConnectWithUUID(java.lang.String address,
                               java.lang.String uuid)
        Connect to a Bluetooth device with the given address and a specific UUID.
        Parameters:
        address - the MAC address of the Bluetooth device
        uuid - the UUID
        Returns:
        true if the connection was successful, false otherwise

      • connect

        private boolean connect(java.lang.String functionName,
                        java.lang.String address,
                        java.lang.String uuidString)
        Connects to a Bluetooth device with the given address and UUID. If the address contains a space, the space and any characters after it are ignored. This facilitates passing an element of the list returned from the addressesAndNames method above.
        Parameters:
        functionName - the name of the SimpleFunction calling this method
        address - the address of the device
        uuidString - the UUID

      • connect

        private void connect(java.lang.Object bluetoothDevice,
                     java.util.UUID uuid)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
